Articles.Content:
I've recently had this problem in EVA mode with Kerbals in which the Kerbal doesn't face opposite to the camera any more. Did I just hit a random button and am paying for my lack of knowledge? (Note: I do have mods but no parts outside of MJ2 that I never use.  My game is basically stock.)

Mods:

-MechJeb 2

-KER

-And Some other Mods that I can't remember because they don't freaking work even though I have the latest versions. I probably need to take them out of all those nasty folders and into just the base one

Are you in camera’s chase mode (cycle through modes with V)?

If a mod isn’t working then I would remove it as it may be causing an issue. Some mods are coded to follow a specific file structure as well so grouping them together isn’t a good idea tbh.
In the settings, there is an option to force Kerbals to follow the camera's angle. Maybe that got turned off?
